title: Print, "Design for Garden Parterres with Scroll Motifs and Boxwood Arbor, from "Nouveaux Livre de Parterres," in Oeuvres Du Sr. D. Marot..., The Hague:  Chez Pierre Husson, c.1702", ca. 1702
medium: Etching and engraving on cream laid paper
inscribed: Imprinted lower left:  A. Gazon./B. Trait de Buys [Boxwood]; lower right:  9; lower left margin:  D. Marot fec:; ; lower right margin:  avec Privileg
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Symmetrical arrangement of parterres de broderie in four sections around a central fountain/parterre; each section consisting of a scroll pattern with leaf and floral motifs (broderie) in between; borders interspersed with urns and topiary.  Along left side, boxwood tunnel.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for Garden Parterres with Scroll Motifs and Boxwood Arbor, from "Nouveaux Livre de Parterres," in Oeuvres Du Sr. D. Marot..., The Hague:  Chez Pierre Husson, c.1702", ca. 1702.
ca. 1702. Etching and engraving on cream laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-15.
